hooks.command: ruff check src/ tests/ --fix --quiet 2>/dev/null; ruff format src/ tests/ --quiet 2>/dev/null
python scripts/validate_doc_references.py 2>/dev/null || echo 'Document reference check failed (non-blocking)'
pytest tests/unit/ -q --tb=line --maxfail=1 2>&1 | head -20 || echo 'Unit tests failed - review before commit'
ruff check src/ tests/ --fix && ruff format src/ tests/

hooks.description: Pre-commit: Full test suite with coverage
Warn if session on main branch
hooks.command: git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null | grep -qx main && echo 'Session ended on main branch - ensure commits are reviewed' || exit 0
